## Table with alignments

+>------------+>-------------<+-------------<+----+
v top left    v top center    v top right    | 1\ |
|             |               |              | 2\ |
|             |               |              | 3  |
+>------------+>-------------<+-------------<+----+
v             v               v              | 1\ |
| middle left | middle center | middle right | 2\ |
^             ^               ^              | 3  |
+>------------+>-------------<+-------------<+----+
|             |               |              | 1\ |
|             |               |              | 2\ |
^ bottom left ^ bottom center ^ bottom right | 3  |
+>------------------------------------------<+----+
X middle center                              |    |
+--------------------------------------------+----+
